title: OMG
body:
why I download this game so slow around200kbps
. Omg who can help me plz!

replies.body: The rate of downloading game files may be as good as the connection you have to our servers.  Try the steps provided in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help tune up or strengthen your connection.  Hope that helps!
I used a Mac to download lol
